artist: Artist: R. Crumb , et al.; Printer: Barefoot Press, Raleigh, N.C.; Publisher: Everett Rand , Durham, N.C.; Publisher: Gioia Palmieri , Durham, N.C.

title: Mineshaft, no. 34
